评论详情: Very cute top, I’m pretty flat chested and the top wasn’t doing much for me but I wore it to my event anyway so do with that information as you please. The structure also stays bent as you bend, for example driving it in make the plastic in the corset bend and not go back. I ordered a medium because although I’m flat chested I have a big rib cage and I feel as if I could have gotten away with and xs but definitely needed a small instead. Very cute top though, quality isn’t the best but not bad by any means.
